ISSUE.TITLE: Allow to delete plugins (admin area)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Now we support plugin uploading. Let's also add "Delete" button to the plugin list page. But enable this functionality only when a plugin is uninstalled. It should be visible for oninstalled plugins only. This way a store owner has to uninstall it first, hence remove appropropriate tables, etc. Also add a confirmation window to this functionality. Once the plugin is deleted we have to restart the site.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #2587 Allowed to delete plugins in admin area
